name: Zipped Intergraph Smart Review Project
summary: A ZVF file is a Zip-compressed Intergraph Smart Review project file ( .SVF file). It contains multiple SmartPlant Review .VUE files, which have been packaged together as a single file and then compressed. Structure designers create ZVF files with SmartPlant Publisher and Smart Interop Publisher.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
